text: @WhiteHouse @SecretaryCarson It will only pass if we do testing, every other counter found out about Covid-19 at the same time we did. They went into action testing, our leader decided to downplay concerns as a hoax & not test to keep his "numbers" low. And here we are mourning 100,000 dead Americans.
